Title: Relates to establishing an amnesty program for any person who has received a ticket for operation of an electric assisted bicycle
Summary: Establishes an amnesty program for any person who has received a ticket for operation of an electric assisted bicycle and provides an exception from the registration requirement of motor vehicles for electric assisted bicycles.
LawCode: Add ยง401-c, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing an amnesty program for any person who has received a ticket for operation of an electric assisted bicycle and providing an exception from the registration requirement of motor vehicles for electric assisted bicycles; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
